description: About Grocery Outlet:Our Mission:Touching lives for the betterOur Vision:Touching lives by being the first choice for bargain-minded consumers in the U.S.Our Values & Behaviors:Achievement, Diversity, Entrepreneurship, Family, Fun, Integrity & ServiceAbout the Team:The members of our Marketing Team are fun, objective, risk takers, innovative and strong communicators. We are always looking for the next trend in Marketing, willing to test and learn, open to feedback, treat the rest of the organization as our clients and enjoy working on many different projects. Additions to the team bring a sense of humor, dedication, hard-work, and the ability to communicate at all levels.About the Role:The Marketing Analytics Manager will play a pivotal role in shaping our marketing strategies through data analysis and insights. The successful candidate will be responsible for collecting, analyzing, and interpreting marketing, customer and market data to inform marketing strategies, drive business decisions, and measure the performance of marketing initiatives. This role reports to the VP of Marketing.Responsibilities Include:Data Analysis and Reporting:Collect and analyze data across marketing platforms to identify trends, opportunities, and challenges.Generate regular reports on marketing campaign performance and customer behavior.Translate complex data findings into understandable and actionable marketing campaigns.Develop and track key performance indicators (KPIs) to measure marketing effectiveness and ROI.Market Research:Partner with Strategy on market research to understand market trends, competitive landscape, and customer preferences.Provide actionable insights based on market research to support marketing strategies.Media Analytics:Utilize Media Mix Modeling to forecast marketing trends and consumer behavior.Create customer segmentation models to tailor marketing strategies to different audience segments.Marketing Strategy:Collaborate with the marketing team to develop and optimize marketing strategies based on findings.Recommend changes to marketing strategies based on data and trends.Cross-functional Collaboration:Work closely with Business Technology, Strategy, and other departments to ensure data quality and the integration of analytics into all marketing activities.Assist with the establishment of best practices in analytics and data-driven decision-making across the company.Technology and Tools:Stay up-to-date with the latest analytics tools and technologies; recommend new tools to enhance analytics capabilities.Manage and ensure the proper integration of marketing analytics tools and software.About the Pay:Base Salary Range: $90,000 - $110,000Annual Bonus ProgramEquity401(k) Profit SharingMedical, Dental, Vision & More!Final compensation will be determined based upon experience and skills and may vary based on location.About You:Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Marketing, Statistics, Mathematics, Economics, Computer Science, Information Management, or a related field5-7 years proven experience as a Marketing Analytics Manager or Data Analyst within the retail or grocery sectorStrong analytical skills with the ability to collect, organize, analyze, and disseminate significant amounts of information with attention to detail and accuracyExperience in statistical analysis and the use of statistical packages for analyzing datasets (Excel, APT-Mastercard Test & Learn.)Proficiency with marketing analytics and CRM tools (Google Analytics, Domo, Appsflyer/Branch, Braze, Optimine etc.)Familiarity with customer segmentation, predictive modeling, and market research techniquesExcellent communication and presentation skillsTo learn about how we collect, use and secure your personal information. Click here to see our privacy policy.
